PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12702024-11-29NR, HC, AAFC
ActFood and Drugs Act
Excise Act, 2001
Pest Control Products Act
Safe Food for Canadians Act
Cannabis Act
Feeds Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Concerning Food Additives and Compositional Standards, Microbiological Criteria and Methods of Analysis for Food
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS CONCERNING FOOD ADDITIVES AND COMPOSITIONAL STANDARDS, MICROBIOLOGICAL CRITERIA AND METHODS OF ANALYSIS FOR FOOD in order to (1) make Canada's FDR more agile, transparent and responsive to new and emerging science, technology, market innovation and risks to health; (2) enable modifications to the FDR's food compositional standards; (3) enable modifications to the FDR's microbiological criteria and associated microbiological methods of analysis; (4) enable modifications to the FDR's methods of analysis; and (5) help reduce the burden on industry.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS CONCERNING FOOD ADDITIVES AND COMPOSITIONAL STANDARDS, MICROBIOLOGICAL CRITERIA AND METHODS OF ANALYSIS FOR FOOD in order to (1) make Canada's FDR more agile, transparent and responsive to new and emerging science, technology, market innovation and risks to health; (2) enable modifications to the FDR's food compositional standards; (3) enable modifications to the FDR's microbiological criteria and associated microbiological methods of analysis; (4) enable modifications to the FDR's methods of analysis; and (5) help reduce the burden on industry.
